Name: Paul's World
About the game: Paul's World is an Old-School RPG game. We designed this game for mini rpg & survival fans. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing, mini games and more, just explore it! Monsters, wild animals, aliens... Who do you think will win? Features Mini RPG Survival game! You can loot items! Manage the basic farm system! Buy new weapons and armors! Fight with enemies and monsters! You can fish! You can cook! You can be a miner! Turn Based Combat System! New mini games! Explore the forest, discover secret places...

Meta Description: Looking for information on Paul's World? Check out the release date (Nov 18, 2019), developer insights from Cloaz Studio, and a complete game summary.
